TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23DB+test.tds.ie+Visitor-dev%2C+Trunkwith encrypted_values as ( select setting_name, safe_enc_toolkit.decrypt(setting_value) setting_value from safe_qr_configurations where setting_name in ('google_spreadsheet_developer_key', 'google_spreadsheet_client_id', 'google_spreadsheet_app_id') ) select trim(lower(sqc.setting_name)) as setting_name, trim(nvl2(ev.setting_name, ev.setting_value, sqc.setting_value)) as setting_value, nvl2(ev.setting_name, ev.setting_value, sqc.setting_value) as setting_value_capital from safe_qr_configurations sqc left join encrypted_values ev on ev.setting_name = sqc.setting_name where sqc.setting_value is not null and safe_request_permissions_pak.check_permission_sql ( :Uidtoken, '(quickregistermenu)(visitorviewmenu)(guestDashboard)(visitoractionmenu)', 'qrConfigurations', 'GET' ) = 'Y'
